DOC.brief_title: Withings Pulse Wave Velocity Blood Pressure Study
DOC.detailed_description: The study population estimate 300 healthy adult subject United States . This population approximately 150 men 150 woman . In order obtain relatively diverse age range user ( vary level arterial stiffness ) , hope enroll participant across three age range enter Withings application user : 18-40 year , 41-60 year , > 60 year . These spot fill satisfy inclusion/exclusion criterion first come , first serve basis .
DOC.criteria: User ( 1 ) Withings blood pressure cuff ( 2 ) Withings activity tracker ( 3 ) Withings Body Cardio scale User measure blood pressure least per week majority week last three month . Aortic artery disease Peripheral vascular disease Atrial fibrillation Weight > 396 lb . Pregnant woman
